TestDescription.name: Database connection string disclosure
TestDescription.Description: A possible database connection string was discovered on this page. The connection string may include attributes such as the name of the driver, server and database, as well as security information such as user name and password.
TestDescription.Impact: The connection strings usually disclose very sensitive information. This information can be used to launch further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Restrict access to this file or restrict the disclosure of this connection string .
